overview:
Experienced, creative & skilled executive, technical-expert & programmer. I always seek challenge, interest & new horizons.

  • I like creating new products using elegant solutions - though constaints are important.
  • Keeping open, personal & polite relations are important for me - in order to create a sinergetic, calm & effective work environment.

For my professional career I’ve lived in various environments and dealt with a variety of technologies: from main-frame with db2 and pl-1/rexx, through oracle developer2000 and Oracle Applications ERP, to web programming of PHP/Codeigniter/Mysql/CSS/HTML/jQuery/javascript.

Some roles I’ve taken (recent to oldest):

  • web developer and system analyst as a freelance, working for small and large companies and customers.
  • Technical manager for HP in Tnuva’s ERP go-live project.
  • Co-founder in an internet web start-up.
  • Development manager for EDS in ECI’s Oracle Applications go-live project.
  • Team leader in the Israeli-Air-Force in its ERP go-live project.
  • System analyst and team leader of a start-up like document management system for the ERP project in the IAF.
  • Programmer for the IAF, programming with developer2000 forms+reports with sql and pl/sql.
  • Programmer for the IAF programming pl/1 and rexx on db2.

Been part of systems being planned, built and implemented - from the first bit, through discussions and designs to go-live and support and various interactions with the systems users.

Now it’s Figrs time!
